biotools.summary: Software that can be used to recognize concepts in human readable text, based on a database (thesaurus) of known terms. Multi-word terms are correctly recognized. If terms can represent multiple concepts, Peregrine will attempt to disambiguate them.

bioschemas.name: Peregrine
bioschemas.summary: Software that can be used to recognize concepts in human readable text, based on a database (thesaurus) of known terms. Multi-word terms are correctly recognized. If terms can represent multiple concepts, Peregrine will attempt to disambiguate them.
